mapper.select: select date_format(start_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') time, count(*) count from nexclipper_incident where regdt >= DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL #{start_time} hour) group by date_format(start_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') order by date_format(start_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') desc limit 1000
select target_ip, count(*) count from nexclipper_incident where regdt >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL #{start_time} hour) group by target_ip limit 1000
select target, count(*) count from nexclipper_incident where regdt >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL #{start_time} hour) group by target limit 1000
